name: Paddlr
description:
Warning: This WebGL build is missing some UI elements :( Working on it

To Play:

- Left mouse - Row forward

- Right mouse - Row backward

- Space - Switch row side

- N - Switch canoe

Made during weekend game jam hosted by Snowed In Studios for Christie Lake Kids, a great charity! 

Eric & Joe - Programmers

Claudia & Aidan - Graphics & Design

Support https://www.christielakekids.com/

Source: https://github.com/ericdalrymple/ChristieLake
